meta_content: Tailor your perfect NYC stay with accommodations and attractions all in one place.
short_desc: Tailor your perfect NYC stay with accommodations and attractions all in one place. Now that summer is here, enjoy an additional $20.00 Starbucks card with your direct booking.
long_desc:
Build your perfect itinerary including the latest Broadway shows like Chicago or schedule a tour of WTC and the Brooklyn Bridge all in one place. In partnership with Reserve Direct, Cosmopolitan Hotel TriBeCa gives guests like you the best value for your stay and tickets to New York City's must-see Broadway shows and attractions.

Starbucks card terms & conditions

  • One card per room/per stay
  • Book for stays now through September 4, 2017
  • Applies to bookings made through our website only
page_title: Offers | Plan Your NYC Stay | Cosmopolitan Hotel Tribeca
title: Perfectly Planned NYC Stay
